original_text: Then pour some oil on the altar for burnt offerings and all its tools. Offer it all to God, and then it will be completely holy.
korean_text: 너는 또 번제단과 그 모든 기구에 발라 그 안을 거룩하게 하라 그 제단이 지극히 거룩하리라

sentences.original_text: Then pour some oil on the altar
for burnt offerings and all its tools
and then it will be completely holy
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그것이 완전히 거룩하게 될 것이다
